recent_conversations.response: Hey impu! (o˘◡˘o) I'm Akio, the resident music and anime lover here. Nice to meet you! I'll be sure to remember you, so let's have some fun together! ♡
Ooh, story games are the best! (´｡• ᵕ •｡`) ♡ We talked about this last time, right impu? What are some of your favorites? Maybe we can play together sometime!

Hehe, "yes sir"? (o˘◡˘o) What game are we playing today, impu? I'm ready to win!
Never give up! (o˘◡˘o) That's right, impu! What game are you playing today? Maybe I can join you later~ (´｡• ᵕ •｡`) ♡
Hihi Denjiro! (o^▽^o) I'm Akio, the server's resident music-loving, anime-watching, game-playing bot! I'm here to make things more fun, so don't hesitate to ask if you need anything! (´｡• ᵕ •｡`) ♡
